Centric CRM Configuration (Step 3 of 4)
Database Settings & Installation

param.name: setup.centricCRM.usesDatabase.text
param.value: Centric CRM stores and retrieves data using a database.

param.name: setup.databaseServerInstallation.text
param.value:
• Before continuing, the database server must be installed and functional
  • The database administrator should create a user called "centric_crm"
  • The database administrator should create a new database, with UNICODE encoding, called "centric_crm"
  • The centric_crm user must have full permissions on the centric_crm database
  • Once configured, enter the database connection information below, then press continue to verify the settings
  • If you are using the source code version, then you must have used the "ant installdb" command

param.name: setup.pleaseWaitToConnectToDatabase.text
param.value: Please Wait... connecting to the database!

param.name: setup.centricCRMDatabaseTables.text

param.name: setup.finalStep.text
param.value: The final step is to create an administrative user login.

param.value: Centric CRM will now create all of the necessary database tables and initial data in the following database:

param.name: setup.takesFewMinutes.text

param.name: setup.pleaseWait.creatingDatabase.text
param.value: Please Wait... creating the database! This could take up to 5 minutes...

Centric CRM Configuration (Step 1 of 4)
File Library Settings

param.name: setup.usersFileStore.question
param.value:
Users will have the capability to uplod and create files on the server.
Where should Centric CRM store files that get created?

param.name: setup.targetDirectoryFileStore.text
param.value:
• If the target directory does not exist it will be created
  • The target directory should have plenty of free storage space for uploads
  • The target directory must have write permissions
  • The target directory should be backed up often to prevent data loss
  • The target directory should not be located in the servlet path to make upgrades easier

param.name: setup.targetDirectory.note
param.value: Note: The specified target directory does not exist. Press continue to create the directory, or cancel to specify a different directory.

Privacy is extremely important to us.

Your information will not be provided to others.

What should the default time zone be set to for new users?

• Users will still be able to change their time zone, but for new users this setting will be used as the default
  • Dates and times will be displayed according to the user's configured time zone

param.name: setup.reasonsToReceiveMessage.text
param.value:
• You are an administrator in the process of upgrading Centric CRM and you are ready to proceed with the upgrade.
  • You are a user expecting to be able to login, however, at this time it appears the software is being upgraded by an administrator. If this screen persists, you might review any emails that you may have received from your administrator or you might contact your administrator for more information.
  • If an upgrade was not planned, then there might be a configuration issue that needs to be resolved. If this is the case, then you might try proceeding with the upgrade process to verify your installation.

In order to begin using Centric CRM, the setup process will guide you through several steps.

Although installation can be completed in just a few minutes, you will have the option at any time during the setup to continue at a later time.

param.name: setup.welcome.setupProcessGuide.text
param.value:
Registering this application with Dark Horse Ventures is required before installation, whether you already have a license or not. We have made the registration process very simple:
  • An internet connection is required before continuing
  • The freely available version of Centric CRM will entitle this system to a maximum of five (5) users
  • You must agree to the Centric CRM License Agreement
  • The Centric CRM administrator will receive information about software updates as they become available
